fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport
eu_initiatives: Implementation of the UE Strategy for the Baltic Sea Region
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Transnational associations and networks of public regional or other sub-national authorities
goals__remit:
UBC is a network of 83 member cities from 10 countries from the Baltic Sea Region.   
The Union’s aim is to promote and strengthen cooperation and exchange of experience among the cities in the Baltic Sea Region, to advocate for common interests of the local authorities in the region, and to act on behalf of the cities and local authorities in common matters towards regional, national, European and international bodies, as well as achieving sustainable development in the BSR with full respect to European principles of local and regional self-governance and subsidiarity.
relevant_communication: Secretariat does not carry out any projects. The work is done by the UBC Commissions.
